title: Gold Steady Near Record High as US Inflation Supports Rate Cuts
description: Gold was steady near a record high as weaker-than expected US inflation data supported the case for more rate cuts, while geopolitical tensions remained elevated.
content: Gold was steady near a record high as weaker-than expected US inflation data supported the case for more rate cuts, while geopolitical tensions remained elevated.
